user.tknSentMessageCardText: Thank you for your transfer request. {username} has been notified, and you will receive a notification as soon as they have either approved or declined.
user.failed_chat_CardText: Something went wrong when connecting to chat with {accountName}. Please try again or contact support.
user.tknFailedTransactionUnderCardText: You do not have enough credit to request this transfer.
user.tknFailedTransactionOverCardText: This transfer request cannot be completed, as it would take {accountName} beyond their positive credit limit.
user.tknFailedTransactionInvalidNumberCardTex: Transfer amount must be a positive integer.
user.whoDoYouWantToSearchForTodayLabel: Who do you want to search for today?
user.user_not_found: No members with that email address found
user.reset_email_instruction_sent: An email with password reset instructions has been sent
user.recipient_balance_too_high_body: This transfer request cannot be completed, as it would take {username} beyond their positive credit limit. {username} has been notified, but please consider following up with them about your intended transfer.
user.insufficient_sender_balance: You do not have enough credit to request this transfer, as the amount is {amount} {credit_unit} and your available credit is {credit} {credit_unit}.
user.receiver_pending_balance_exceeded: This transfer request cannot be completed, as it would take {seller} beyond their positive credit limit. {seller} has been notified, but please consider following up with them about your intended transfer.

event.time_error_body: The event end time cannot be before the start time. Please try again.

shop.complete_purchase_thank_you: Thank you for your purchase request.
shop.complete_purchase_user_notified: has been notified, and you will receive a notification as soon as they have either approved or declined.
shop.seller_has_reached_limit: This purchase request cannot be completed, as it would take {seller} beyond their positive credit limit(s). These seller(s) have been notified, but please consider following up with them about your intended purchase(s).

shop.seller_has_approved_notification: notification when the seller has approved your purchase request.

shop.item_added: The item has been added to your cart.
shop.purchase_could_not_complete: The purchase could not be completed
shop.youHaventReceivedAnyPurchaseRequestsYet: You have not received any purchase requests yet
shop.whatDoYouWantToSearchForTodayLabel: What do you want to search for today?
shop.purchase_request_cannot_be_approved_buye: The purchase request cannot be approved, as it would take {buyer_username} below their negative credit limit. Please consider following up with them.
shop.purchase_request_cannot_be_approved_sell: The purchase request cannot be approved, as your balance would then exceed your positive credit limit by {excess_credit} {credit_unit}.
shop.pending_purchases: You have pending purchases that must be approved by the seller(s) before they are completed. You will receive notification(s) when they have approved or declined the purchase(s).
shop.seller_pending_balance_exceeded: This purchase request cannot be completed, as it would take {seller} beyond their positive credit limit(s). These seller(s) have been notified, but please consider following up with them about your intended purchase(s).

notifications.purchase_request: You have received a purchase request from
notifications.transfer_request: has made a transfer request for
notifications.denied_purchase: has declined your purchase request for {number_of_units} unit(s) of {item_name}.
notifications.denied_transfer: has declined your transfer request for {total_price} {credit_unit}.
notifications.cancelled_transfer: has cancelled their transfer request for {total_price} {credit_unit}.
notifications.seller_limit_exceeded: {buyer_username} initiated a purchase request with you for {total_price} {credit_unit}, but this could not be processed as it would have taken your balance beyond your positive credit limit. Please consider following up with {buyer_username} about their intended purchase.
notifications.seller_pending_limit_exceeded: {buyer_username} initiated a purchase request with you for {total_price} {credit_unit}, but this could not be processed as it would have taken your balance plus the sum of your pending purchase/transfer requests beyond your positive credit limit. Please consider following up with {buyer_username} about their intended purchase.
notifications.send_balance_seller_pending_limit_exceed: {buyer_username} initiated a transfer request with you for {total_price} {credit_unit}, but this could not be processed as it would have taken your balance plus the sum of your pending purchase/transfer requests beyond your positive credit limit. Please consider following up with {buyer_username} about their intended transfer.
notifications.transaction_cancelled: {buyer_username} has cancelled their purchase request for {number_of_units} unit(s) of {item_name}.
notifications.send_balance_seller_balance_too_high: {username} initiated a transfer request with you for transfer {amount} {credit_unit}, but this could not be processed as it would have taken your balance beyond your positive credit limit. Please consider following up with {username} about their intended transfer.
